summary: This is an email scheduling a brief meeting regarding the Epstein case for August 14, 2019, at 3pm in the 8th floor library. The meeting is to include 'PC chiefs' and the 'Epstein team'.

events.title: Epstein Case Meeting
events.description: A brief meeting regarding the Epstein case is scheduled for 3pm in the 8th floor library with the PC chiefs and the Epstein team.

keyFacts: A meeting regarding the Epstein case was scheduled for August 14, 2019, at 3pm.
The meeting was to be held in the 8th floor library.
The meeting participants included 'PC chiefs' and the 'Epstein team'.
The email was sent on the same day as the scheduled meeting (August 14, 2019).
The document is an internal email coordinating a meeting about the case.
